mapper.select: {CALL PKG_SWEB_CRED_SOLI_LEGAL.SP_LISTAR_SOL_LEGAL( #{codSoliCred}, #{codSolcre}, #{nroExpediente}, #{nomPerso}, #{codEstLeg}, #{noCia}, #{busqueda, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=java.sql.ResultSet, resultMap=pe.com.divemotor.solicitudcredito.mapper.LegalMapper.legalMap}, #{status, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{mensaje, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} )}

{CALL PKG_SWEB_CRED_SOLI_LEGAL.SP_REGISTRA_OPERACION_LEGAL( #{codDocrev}, #{codSolcre}, #{nomRevision}, #{observacion}, #{codTipope}, #{codUsuario}, #{codDocrevOut, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{status, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{mensaje, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} )}

{CALL PKG_SWEB_CRED_SOLI_LEGAL.SP_REGISTRA_PERSONA_FACULTADA( #{codFdorev}, #{codSolcre}, #{codDocrev}, #{cargo}, #{nombre}, #{doi}, #{codUsuario}, #{codFdorevOut, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{codDocrevOut, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{status, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{mensaje, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} )}

{CALL PKG_SWEB_CRED_SOLI_LEGAL.SP_REGISTRA_DOCUMENTO_REVISION( #{codDdorev}, #{codSolcre}, #{codDocrev}, #{codOpeleg}, #{codTipope}, #{indConforme}, #{codUsuario}, #{codDdorevOut, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{codDocrevOut, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{status, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{mensaje, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} )}

{CALL PKG_SWEB_CRED_SOLI_LEGAL.SP_REGISTRAR_LEGAL( #{codSoliCred}, #{codEstope}, #{codEstleg}, #{nroExpediente}, #{noCia}, #{codClie}, #{fechaSolcre}, #{fechaRevision}, #{fechaCaduca}, #{codUsuario}, #{codSolcre, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{status, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{mensaje, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} )}

{CALL PKG_SWEB_CRED_SOLI_LEGAL.SP_REGISTRAR_GARA_MOB( #{codCanleg}, #{codSoliCred}, #{tipPersona}, #{propietario}, #{marca}, #{placa}, #{modelo}, #{anio}, #{tipoBien}, #{nombrePersona}, #{apPaternoPersona}, #{apMaternoPersona}, #{nombreConyuge}, #{apPaternoConyuge}, #{apMaternoConyuge}, #{tipoDocPersona}, #{nroDocPersona}, #{tipoDocConyuge}, #{nroDocConyuge}, #{opinionLegal}, #{codUsuario}, #{codCanlegOut, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{status, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{mensaje, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} )}

{CALL PKG_SWEB_CRED_SOLI_LEGAL.SP_REGISTRAR_DOC_LEG_SOL( #{codCanleg}, #{codDanleg}, #{codDtipope}, #{codTipope}, #{indConforme}, #{observacion}, #{codUsuario}, #{codDanlegOut, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{codCanlegOut, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{status, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{mensaje, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} )}

{CALL PKG_SWEB_CRED_SOLI_LEGAL.SP_REGISTRAR_GARA_HIP( #{codCanleg}, #{codSoliCred}, #{tipPersona}, #{propietario}, #{ubicacion}, #{areaMetro}, #{tipMedida}, #{parRegistral}, #{sedRegistral}, #{asiento}, #{tipoBien}, #{nombrePersona}, #{apPaternoPersona}, #{apMaternoPersona}, #{nombreConyuge}, #{apPaternoConyuge}, #{apMaternoConyuge}, #{tipoDocPersona}, #{nroDocPersona}, #{tipoDocConyuge}, #{nroDocConyuge}, #{opinionLegal}, #{observacion1}, #{observacion2}, #{codUsuario}, #{codCanlegOut, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{status, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{mensaje, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} )}

{CALL PKG_SWEB_CRED_SOLI_LEGAL.SP_REGISTRAR_FIANZA_SOL_PN( #{codCanleg}, #{codSoliCred}, #{propietario}, #{tipoBien}, #{nombrePersona}, #{apPaternoPersona}, #{apMaternoPersona}, #{nombreConyuge}, #{apPaternoConyuge}, #{apMaternoConyuge}, #{tipoDocPersona}, #{nroDocPersona}, #{tipoDocConyuge}, #{nroDocConyuge}, #{opinionLegal}, #{observacion1}, #{observacion2}, #{codUsuario}, #{codCanlegOut, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{status, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{mensaje, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} )}
